products.aiDescription: The Charmed Tennis Dress in White, Size 2XS by Alo Yoga® is the ultimate choice for women who want to look stylish and feel comfortable while playing tennis or running errands. Made with the signature Airbrush fabric, this lightweight collared dress is designed to flatter every size and provide a full range of motion. The preppy button-up detailing and cool collar add a touch of sophistication, making it perfect for coffee runs too. Wear it with your favorite Alo shorts for additional support and enjoy the perfect fit that has been wear-tested by the in-house team.

products.name: Nike Renew Elevate 3 Basketball Shoes
products.brandedName: Nike Renew Elevate 3 Basketball Shoes
products.description: How to choose your size. Our sizing buttons list the Men's size first (M) and the equivalent Women's size second (W) Ex. If you usually wear a Women's size 9.5, select the button with M 8.0 / W 9.5. Product Features: Structured mesh upper for stability and breathable comfort. Padded collar provides comfort near the ankle. TPU piece at the laces hold you in for a snug fit. Dual foam includes Nike Renew that’s soft and comfortable and a firmer option that provides structure. Durable rubber traction outsole for durability and grip. The Nike Renew Elevate 3 is imported. Out on the court, precision and comfort are a necessity. Turn to the Nike Renew Elevate 3 Basketball Shoes for unmatched cushioning thanks to the dual-density foam, lightweight breathability and plenty of structure that keeps you going as the game clock winds down.
products.aiDescription: Looking for the perfect basketball shoes? Look no further than the Nike Renew Elevate 3 Basketball Shoes from JD Sports. These men's shoes feature a structured mesh upper for stability and breathability, a padded collar for comfort, and a TPU piece at the laces for a snug fit. The dual-density foam includes Nike Renew for softness and comfort, while a firmer option provides structure. The durable rubber traction outsole ensures grip and durability. Choose your size with ease using our sizing buttons that list the Men's size first (M) and the equivalent Women's size second (W). Get ready to dominate the court with these top-of-the-line basketball shoes from Nike.

products.unbrandedName: Flora Cape-effect Crepe Midi Dress - Ivory
products.description: Not only is Safiyaa's 'Flora' dress elegant, but it's handmade using traditional artisanal techniques to ensure the fit is perfect, too. Crafted from ivory crepe, it has oversized pleated panels that drape over your arms and wrap around the small part of your waist. It's cut for a flatteringly slim fit and hits at a midi length. We think it's the perfect option for a modern bride - choose icy pumps or tanzanite jewelry for your 'something blue'.

products.name: Ophidia medium tote bag
products.brandedName: Gucci Ophidia medium tote bag
products.description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A heritage material from the archive, GG Supreme has been reimagined in Gucci Love Parade in different color combinations and combined with contemporary as well as classic styles. The Ophidia tote is presented in a beige and white variation of the signature material with a tonal trim. Originally a play on a '30s design, the canvas speaks to the historical narrative that runs throughout the collection. Beige and white GG Supreme canvas, Oatmeal leather trim, Gold-toned hardware, Green and red Web, Cotton linen lining, Double G, Interior zipper pocket, Double leather handles with 10" drop and 21" length Magnetic snap closure Weight: .71kg approximately, Medium size: 15"W x 11"H x 5.5"D, Made in Italy, Fits up to: iPhone Pro Max/Plus, Airpods, long wallet, and lipstick

products.name: CeCe Women's Short Sleeve Tiered V-Neck Baby Doll Dress
products.brandedName: CeCe Women's Short Sleeve Tiered V-Neck Baby Doll Dress
products.unbrandedName: Women's Short Sleeve Tiered V-Neck Baby Doll Dress
products.description: Put your best foot forward in this beautiful tiered dress from CeCe. Pair this design with heels for a chic finish. About The Brand: CeCe is a contemporary lifestyle brand inspired by a romantic take on the everyday, punctuated by taste, wit, and on-the-go flair.
products.aiDescription: Looking for a stylish and comfortable dress that will make you stand out from the crowd? Look no further than the CeCe Women's Short Sleeve Tiered V-Neck Baby Doll Dress! This stunning dress is perfect for any occasion, whether you're heading to a wedding, a party, or just out for a night on the town. With its flattering V-neckline and tiered design, this dress is sure to turn heads. And thanks to its high-quality construction and comfortable fit, you'll feel as great as you look. So why wait? Head to Macy's today and pick up your own CeCe Women's Short Sleeve Tiered V-Neck Baby Doll Dress! This is a women's favorite.

products.name: Square Neck Satin A-Line Gown
products.brandedName: Alfred Sung Square Neck Satin A-Line Gown
products.description: A classic silhouette sets a mood of quiet sophistication for an A-line gown cut from glossy satin and detailed with a dancefloor-friendly side slit. 59 1/2" length (size 8) Square neck Sleeveless Lined 100% polyester Machine wash, tumble dry Imported
products.aiDescription: This Square Neck Satin A-Line Gown by Alfred Sung is the epitome of quiet sophistication. Made from glossy satin, this dress features a classic A-line silhouette and a dancefloor-friendly side slit. The square neck and sleeveless design add a touch of elegance, while the 100% polyester lining ensures comfort. With a length of 59 1/2", this gown is perfect for any formal occasion. Machine washable and tumble dry, this gown is a must-have for any woman's wardrobe. Available at Nordstrom.

products.name: Tiered printed chiffon gown
products.brandedName: Marchesa Notte Tiered printed chiffon gown
products.description: Complete this sensational look with a clutch and drop earrings for a special event gown printed chiffon tulle trims tiered concealed hook and zip fastening at back fully lined lightweight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean imported
products.aiDescription: The Marchesa Notte tiered printed chiffon gown is the perfect choice for women attending special events. This stunning gown features a beautiful print and delicate tulle trims. The tiered and pleated design adds a touch of elegance, while the concealed hook and zip fastening at the back ensures a seamless fit. Made from non-stretchy and mid-weight fabric, this gown is fully lined for added comfort. Complete the look with a clutch and drop earrings for a sensational ensemble. Available at THE OUTNET.COM.

products.brandedName: Marc Fisher Women's Deren Platform High Heel Sandals
products.unbrandedName: Women's Deren Platform High Heel Sandals
products.description: The Marc Fisher Deren platform high heeled ankle strap sandals are giving us all the 70's vibes we love to see. The high heel is paired with a high front platform for all the height without the discomfort, and the double straps on the upper are knotted together for that extra stylish detail.
